mahya#miqmAnitya#bravIqnna vai tasyaq ta I#Sataq itya#bravIqd-yad-ya#j~javAqstau hIya#tEq mamaq vai taditiq tasmA$d-yaj~javAqstu nAByaqvEtyaq(gm)q sO$&bravId-yaqj~jE mA &&BaqjAtha# tE paqSUn nABi ma(gg)#syaq itiq tasmA# EqtaM maqnthina#H sa(gg) srAqvama#juhOqt tatOq vai tasya# ruqdraH paqSUn nABya#manyataq yatraiqta ( ) mEqvaM ~MviqdvAn maqnthina#H sa(gg) srAqvaM juqhOtiq na tatra# ruqdraH paqSUnaqBi ma#nyatE || 31
